m_szDocSumamry: March 29th, 2016 by Kyle Field   While the vehicles we drive and the tools we use continue to get smarter and smarter, proof that humans don’t always follow suit abounds. The latest example of this is, ironically, tied in with arguably the most technologically advanced vehicle on the planet — the Tesla Model X and it’s beautiful falcon-wing doors. The doors are equipped with a full suite of sensors that, when combined with the ability to pivot on two unique axes, allow them to open in even the tightest of spaces.
